SEARCH
Module FloWeekTracker
Package org.example.floweektracker.planner

Class PlannerTableManager

java.lang.Object
com.floweektracker.planner.PlannerDataManager
com.floweektracker.planner.PlannerTableManager
public class PlannerTableManager extends PlannerDataManager
Represents the management of the DefaultTableModel for a org.example.floweektracker.planner. This class handles the JTable that is displayed to the user as their weekly org.example.floweektracker.planner. It extends PlannerDataManager to manage the org.example.floweektracker.planner's data.

Fields:
  • org.example.floweektracker.planner - a JTable representing the UI of the weekly org.example.floweektracker.planner, displayed to the user
DefaultTableModel methods:
  • createPlannerModel() - creates a DefaultTableModel for the org.example.floweektracker.planner
  • collectSortedTimes() - collects all unique times from the tasks in PlannerDataManager.planners and uses this information to determinate the number of rows in the createPlannerModel() method
  • countPoints() - counts the achieved and total points for each day of the week
Planner Methods:
  • setupPlanner() - configures the org.example.floweektracker.planner
  • refreshPlanner() - refreshes org.example.floweektracker.planner after data changing
Getters: org.example.floweektracker.planner

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JTable
    getPlanner()
     
    void
    refreshPlanner()
    Sets the model for the org.example.floweektracker.planner and customizes its appearance: The name of the current weekday, all tasks for the current weekday, and the current time are displayed in black; others are in gray. Completed tasks have their names crossed out in the org.example.floweektracker.planner.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlannerTableManager

      public PlannerTableManager()
      Constructs a new PlannerTableManager instance. Calls the super() method to invoke the PlannerDataManager constructor. Then, initializes the org.example.floweektracker.planner field. Finally, calls the setupPlanner() method to configure the org.example.floweektracker.planner.
      See Also:
      • MainPanelUI.plannerTableManager
      • MainPanelUI.org.example.floweektracker.planner

  • Method Details

    • refreshPlanner

      public void refreshPlanner()
      Sets the model for the org.example.floweektracker.planner and customizes its appearance:
      • The name of the current weekday, all tasks for the current weekday, and the current time are displayed in black; others are in gray.
      • Completed tasks have their names crossed out in the org.example.floweektracker.planner.
      See Also:
      • MainListeners.refreshApp()
      • setupPlanner()

    • getPlanner

      public JTable getPlanner()
      Returns:
      a org.example.floweektracker.planner representing UI of the user's weekly org.example.floweektracker.planner.
      See Also:
      • MainPanelUI.org.example.floweektracker.planner
      • MainListeners.createPlannerListener()
